history.content:
We are recruiting lab assistants for Data 8 for this fall.  We're looking for students at UC Berkeley who have taken Data 8, received a B- or better, are passionate about the course, and have the potential to become tutors and UGSIs in future semesters.

Deadline: Tuesday, 8/21 at 11:59 PM
Orientation: Monday, 8/27 6pm - 7pm
First lab with learning assistants: Wednesday & Thursday, 8/29 - 8/30

Most learning assistants will work for 3 hr/week, but you can work for 6 hr/week if the instructors determine that it will not adversely affect your studies. The breakdown of the 3 hours consists of:
- 1 hour of preparation (e.g. doing the weekly lab ahead of time, consulting with the (U)GSI, etc.)
- 2 hours of assisting in lab
3 hr/week translates to 1 P/NP teaching unit with Professor Wagner. 6 hr/week translates to 2 P/NP units.

Fill out the form with your @berkeley.edu email address if you’re interested!

https://goo.gl/forms/KemwsmJUNYpb93WB2

If you have any questions, feel free to send them to Annie Nguyen (vienannguyen@berkeley.edu).
history.subject: Data 8 is hiring Lab Assistants
